title: Warm lentil salad
directions: add lentils to boiling water, cover and simmer about 25-30 minutes. Remove from heat, add salt, let sit for 5 minutes and drain
toss carrots, onions and brussel sprouts with 2 Tbsp olive oil, herbes de provence, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper and roast for about 25 minutes
in empty lentil pot add red wine vinegar,garlic, mustard, honey and salt and pepper. Drizzle remining olove oil while whisking. Add lentils and stir to combine
add roasted vegetables to lentils and fold together with half of the parsley and dill. Garnish with remining parsley and dill.
ingredients: 2 cups green lentils, not split picked over and rinsed
8 carrots, cut into bite size pieces
8 oz peeled purple pearl onions halved
sea salt and pepper to taste
